title: The kid dies from Vex Phoebe poisoning?
subtitle: A viral Facebook post claimed that a child died in his sleep after applying his mother-in-law Vex Faborup to calm his father-in-law, but we found no evidence of the incident.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A young Mexican mother's son was recently poisoned by the objective application of Vex Fabopprop.
